items.sentence: I have no practical reason to learn that language.
I want you more than I've ever wanted anyone else.
We all thought that Tom was having a heart attack.
Tom still can't make himself understood in French.
I'll phone you as soon as I arrive at the station.
Tom thinks Mary is a lot older than she really is.
Tom doesn't like coffee very much. He prefers tea.
Tom isn't planting flowers. He's planting lettuce.
I think whichever you choose, you'll be satisfied.
It's best to just pretend that that didn't happen.
